item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (319 points | 70 comments)
2. Web Browser Engineering (481 points | 85 comments)
3. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (169 points | 56 comments)

6. Short films by Lillian F. Schwartz (1927-2024) (79 points | 13 comments)
7. Mothbox 4.0 (87 points | 7 comments)
8. World conker champion found with steel chestnut, cleared of cheating (367 points | 503 comments)
9. Command AI Bought by Amplitude (5 points | 1 comment)
10. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (310 points | 206 comments)
11. Drawing Graphics on Apple Vision with the Metal Rendering API (108 points | 63 comments)
12. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (477 points | 170 comments)
13. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (367 points | 155 comments)
14. Invisible text that AI chatbots understand and humans can't? (50 points | 27 comments)

20. U.S. Judge Asked to Collect $1.4M Moldovan Judgment Against Cloudflare (38 points | discuss)
21. Extracting financial disclosure and police reports with OpenAI Structured Output (237 points | 82 comments)
22. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (165 points | 8 comments)
23. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (228 points | 54 comments)

26. Furilabs Linux Phone (178 points | 205 comments)
27. 19th century lions preyed on humans and giraffes (45 points | 53 comments)

29. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (230 points | 77 comments)
30. Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) Basics (79 points | 18 comments)
